root.name: The Sims Social
root.description: OverviewThe Sims Social is a browser game that you play on Facebook. You create a Sim and a house. Your Facebook friends are your neighbors and you can interact with them. You can invite them to dinner or fall in love with them. The game has all the hooks of a Sims game except that you're interacting with real people. This game will be retired on June 14, 2013.
